channel.title: Coming Spring 2026 on Don Morris Books
channel.description: Recent content in Coming Spring 2026 on Don Morris Books

item.title: Echoes of Tartarus
item.description: Ruby Ward serves as a Hoplite peacekeeper tasked with upholding Sibylla’s order. After a stretch of welcome calm, her squad is caught completely off guard by a harmless protest that ends in an execution and a one-way trip to the fertiliser heap.
